Reviews.Title: “Worst of the Worst”
Reviews.Author: sherry c
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 5 nights because my company booked me here. It was terrible. Never stay here. We were leaving and forgot to put the key in the room, returned and house keeping WAS REMAKING THE BED NOT CHANGING IT! NO TOWELS NO COFFEE WE TOOK OUT OUR OWN GARBAGE!!!

Reviews.Title: “This place sucks!!!!”
Reviews.Author: saltlady1
Reviews.Content: Find someplace else. The heater smoked and set off the alarm. The hotel was full of dogs barking inside the hotel. And the place smelled like dogs.The non smoking room smelled like a bar. I booked for 2 nights but stayed one. It is outdated. I guess you get what you pay for and with this place that is not much.....

Reviews.Title: “Last time I will ever stay here!”
Reviews.Author: CallyEP
Reviews.Content: I have have stayed here at least three or four other times in the past. The first two stays I had little to no problems. The last two have been bad, and I will never stay here again! Problems: *Checked in around midnight and it took forever to get a person to the desk. *Shower head was all messed up and they supposedly had no other rooms avaible. I ended up fixing the shower head myself after showering in another friends room. *The kitchen sink plumbing was broken and was collecting in buckets under the sink. *Light was out in the refridgerator. *Cobb webs hanging from the ceiling. *Room key kept deactivating. *Could hear people talking outside the building while staying on the second floor. *Lastly they charged for me for the night after I checked out, but thankfully I was refunded!

Reviews.Title: “Deplorable and a Health Hazard to stay here!!”
Reviews.Author: steely34
Reviews.Content: I reserved this room for three nights through a third party website. Upon arrival and during check-in - the smell of the lobby was very bad. When I checked into the room - the smell was worse. There was food down in the vents of the air conditioner and it was clear that since this was an efficiency apt. type room that fried foods were cooked in the room and the room was never cleaned prior to my arrival. The following morning I woke up @ 3am and could not take it anymore. I packed my bags and when I walked out of the room there was a dog peeing on the hallway carpet!!!!!! The dogs owner said not to worry - that she would clean it up---- while holding a bath towel. There was no shampoo in the bathroom - you have to purchase it through a vending machine. The rooms are not cleaned while you are there. People are living there full time and there is no security. Very unsafe conditions and a clear health hazard!!!!!!! Do not - I repeat - do not stay here. This place needs to be shut down - I mean really - there was a dog peeing on the hallway carpet!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Safer and Cleaner sleeping on the street”
Reviews.Author: Susanjane23
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at the hotel there was a bunch of people hanging out in the lobby drinking and using profanity; something I wouldn't expose my kids to. The front desk clerk was friendly but in a hurry to get back to her friends. When we got to the room we noticed that the door was open, it looked as though someone had tried to pry the door open at some point. Mu husband pushed on the door and assured me it wouldn't open if locked. The hallways were terribly lit and the wallpaper was falling off of the walls. Upon entering the room it was clear that the room had not been cleaned in quite some time. There was a white powdered substance all over the back of the doors and locks, I immediately cleaned it off because I was unsure of what it was, the floors were covered in a layer of dust which was unsafe for me due to my asthma, the fuse box wouldn't close leaving the fuses exposed, the outlet covers were falling off of the wall, the closet doors were full length mirrors that were cracked and broken in half, the television was broken, the toilet didn't flush, there was a film on the back of the headboard, I could go on and on about the condition of the room... We stayed there for about 2 1/2 hours until we found another hotel. As we were leaving there was 3 guys screaming through the lobby door to let us in which we did not as we felt very uncomfortable. When we took our luggage to the car we realized that the back door to the hotel did not close or lock which is very unsafe. When we walked out the dimly lit parking lot, one of the men from the lobby was looking in our car windows!! The "manager" followed us out to our car and asked us why were leaving after 3 hours, we made something up about our dog to avoid confrontation and got out of there!! We ended up spending the rest of our trip at a La Quinta that I would recommend to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: “My first time at this hotel, it won't be my last.”
Reviews.Author: Klyde27
Reviews.Content: This was my first stay at a Homestead Suite Hotel, I was impressed by the comfort provided for the lower cost. The hotel was clean, friendly, located in a nice area and just what we needed.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay!”
Reviews.Author: CallyEP
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Homestead Suites Memphis Airport during August 2010 for eight days. The check in was fast and there were no problems. The room was right next to the elevator which was very nice. The room was also a corner room, so it was very spacious. The room was very nice and very clean. I have stayed at many extended stay hotels before and In my opinion Homestead Suites is a step up from other extended stay hotels. What I really liked: *I felt very safe *Nice and friendly hotel staff. *Open and inviting lobby. *Large bathroom counter and sink. *Lots of space for clothing and cabinets for food. *Even though the hotel is near the airport I never heard noise from a Plane. *Over all the room was very nice and comfortable. Problems: *Room key kept deactivating. *Glass sliding doors to the closet were loose, and one door came completely off the track. *When I payed for Internet, the desk did not give me the pass code the first time. *The shower curtain was a very thin fabric and there was not a plastic shower liner. *The toilet paper holder was almost broken on one side. *There were cobwebs in two of corners of the walls in the room. *One night the person working had a dog with her, and the dog followed me to the elevator.

Reviews.Title: “Going to the airport? Good Luck!”
Reviews.Author: alespi
Reviews.Content: We were stuck in memphis for 3 days and the simple task of coming and going to the airport was a pain in the a**. Front desk person was rude and didn't really try to explain the reasons for no shuttle service, even though the company's website states complimentary airport shuttle service. We spent 60+ dollars in taxi fare alone. Stay away from this hotel totally misleading.

Reviews.Title: “It's the WORST!”
Reviews.Author: jack28995
Reviews.Content: We made reservations 8 weeks early but got the worst room ever! It smelled like cat pee, there was mold and mildew, the carpet was soaked from...who knows...it was dirty, incomplete utinsels, no remote and did I say it stunk! Stay anywhere else but here.

Reviews.Title: “Sleep on the street or stay here? It's a toss up.”
Reviews.Author: YouCalled
Reviews.Content: Staying at a great hotel while on vacation can make memories that last a lifetime. Staying at the Homestead Studio Suites will haunt you long after you've been treated for a communicable disease or two. I believe the poor soul who coined the term 'fleabag' must have spent a night at this wretched establishment. If you've ever wanted to know what it would be like to live in a bomb shelter in Afghanistan, this is the place for you. I defy anyone to find a worse place to stay in the United States. Flithy old carpet, both on the floor and walls, a bathroom which leaves only those with a strong stomach to take a shower, and if you are fortunate, a decrepit air conditioner to blow biohazard air directly on you. But hey, at least the bugs that infest the place are less active if you turn your tiny closet of a room into an icebox. I wish the best of luck to anyone brave or foolish enough to ever stay here

Reviews.Title: “Better Choices Available”
Reviews.Author: rrraganjr75
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this hotel. It is in a bad area and the hotel is in dire need of repairs. My room should not have been rented to anyone as it had major issues. I would suggest booking at the Courtyard Marriott down the road.

Reviews.Title: “I've had better nights rest camping”
Reviews.Author: scorral
Reviews.Content: I've stayed in some real crappy hotels, throughout the US and internationally. I'm not a high-maintenance person; I only need a functioning bathroom, a bed, and a pillow. This is the worst place I've stayed at in a looonnngggg time. First of all, this place was in the middle of an office park, with no clear way to get there. The business park had street signs with no words on them. About five u-turns and 30 mins after we got off of the interstate, we finally found it. The staff was super friendly, however there was no shampoo/conditioner (staff told us they were out), and there was only one paper-thin pillow (staff said there weren't any available). The mattress was small, and felt like a trampoline. My husband, being a nice guy, let me have the piece of paper pillow, which apparently didn't help because we both woke with sore necks and headaches. The rooms were huge, but old and dirty. The roar of airplanes made it feel like we were sleeping on the runway. I honestly have had a better nights rest camping, because then at least I knew to bring shampoo and a pillow.

Reviews.Title: “It only looks good from the outside”
Reviews.Author: fungoing123
Reviews.Content: Resevations were made at this hotel at least a month prior to arrival. My family was having a family get together over the fourth and reserved 5 rooms. Nothing was right. Long story short eveything was wrong from the reservations to the AWFUL smell of the rooms! We checked in at 3am and was out by there 11am check out. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. The rest of our trip was spent up the street at the Holiday Inn Select.

Reviews.Title: “Staff was nice but the location was NOT nice”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was very nice and helpful. This location is NOT a place I would recommend, stay elsewhere! A co-worker mentioned that I shouldn't stay in this area but I was getting in late on Friday and just thought it would be fine. I cancelled my second night and booked another hotel because of the area. There are NOT any restaurants or other places open at night. There were two guests who were asking about restaurants nearby and the only thing the staff could recommend was a fast food place. When I left in the morning, I saw that there really weren't ANY places by there.

HotelInfo.Name: Homestead Studio Suites Memphis Airport
HotelInfo.Address: 2541 Corporate Avenue East, Memphis, TN 38132
